root.name: Virtual-On: Cyber Troopers
root.description: ReleasesVirtual-On: Cyber Troopers was released for arcades, Sega Saturn PC in America and Japan. There were two PC versions released, a normal version for North America a 3D accelerated version for Japan. This game had two-player online versions of the game released in America Japan for the Sega Saturn using theNetLink XBAND. Later, in 2007, a Playstation 2 version was released as Volume 31 in the Sega Ages 2500 line and can be recognized by its Japanese title: Dennou Senki Virtual On. Input MethodThis game used two joysticks to play.
